summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Seneca Street over and across Lot 1, Block 182, Seattle Tidelands, providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the construction of an exit ramp in Seneca Street as widened herein, connecting the existing overhead structure in Alaskan Way with First Ave., providing for the establishment of center line grades on said exit ramp; providing for the taking of an easement for sight view across Lots 1 & 2, Block 182, Seattle Tide Lands, and providing for payment therefor from funds heretofore appropriated by Ordinance No. 88380.
